sentences.en: A host of problems may delay the opening of the Channel Tunnel.
sentences.cn: 可能推迟英吉利海峡隧道开通的问题一大筐。

sentences.en: All the travelling expenses will be borne by the host country.
Barcelona was chosen to be host of the 1992 Olympic games.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那获选为1992年奥运会的主办城市。

sentences.en: He left a host of other riders trailing in his slipstream.
sentences.cn: 他把其他的摩托车手甩在身后。

sentences.en: Host and guests frequently raised their glasses during the feast.
I would like to propose a vote of thanks to our host.
sentences.cn: 我提议对我们的主人表示感谢。

sentences.en: Ian, our host, introduced us to the other guests.
sentences.cn: 主人伊恩把我们介绍给了其他客人。

sentences.en: Our host greeted us at the door.
Our host was very generous, heaping a plate of food to us.
sentences.cn: 主人十分慷慨, 给我们装了一盘食物.

sentences.en: That would be a reversal of the order of host and guest.
The acre of garden is host to a splendid bank of rhododendrons.
sentences.cn: 一英亩见方的花园生长出一大片绚烂的杜鹃花.

sentences.en: The cars have brought in their train a host of other problems.
sentences.cn: 汽车随之带来其他一大堆问题。

sentences.en: The host fears the guests won't get on.
sentences.cn: 主人担心客人们会相处得不愉快。

sentences.en: The host seized my hand and shook it heartily.
sentences.cn: 主人抓住我的手,热情地和我握手.

sentences.en: The new e-books will include a host of Rough Guide titles.
sentences.cn: 新电子书将包括大量的简明指南。

sentences.en: Uganda's beautiful highlands are host to a wide range of wildlife.
sentences.cn: 乌干达美丽的高地是众多野生动物的栖息地。

sentences.en: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.cn: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

words.tran_cn: 招待周到地；亲切地；善于款待地
女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东

phrases.tran_cn: n. 主办城市；举办城市
寄宿家庭；接待留学生的家庭

trans.tran_cn: 主人，东道主，节目主持人，主机，寄主，大量，祭品，圣体
trans.tran_en: someone at a party, meal etc who has invited the guests and who provides the food, drink etc

trans.tran_cn: 作为主人组织，主办活动，主持，存储网站
trans.tran_en: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event
to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event
